Text: Great Gourmands Kim John This Saturday night the Great Gourmand Dinner Club is gathering to recognize the contributions of the legendary Owen Edward Brennan family to Creole culinary arts Well meet at pm at our house at Barrington Pointe League City TX A map will follow by email Would you bring the following entree prepared to serve people Crabmeat Imperial pound lump crabmeat picked over to remove any shell and cartilage cup scallions finely chopped cup green bell pepper finely chopped cup chopped pimentos egg yolk teaspoon dry mustard artichoke hearts coarsely chopped tablespoons paprika cup mayonnaise cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese cup seasoned bread crumbs Salt and black pepper Preheat oven to degrees In a large bowl combine the crabmeat scallions bell pepper pimento egg yolk dry mustard artichoke hearts paprika and onehalf cup of the mayonnaise Stir until wellmixed and season with salt and pepper to taste Spoon the crabmeat mixture into four onecup baking dishes then cover with the remaining mayonnaise Sprinkle Parmesan and bread crumbs on top and bake in the hot oven for to minutes until heated through Serve immediately Makes four servings rcrabmeatimperialhtml If you have any questions call me at Good Luck Hattie Jim

An Article for You to See HChronicleKim In this mornings Chronicle in the Viewpoints section is an article you should read about the high quality employees Enron has so carefully selected over the years Be sure and read it youll be glad you did Hope things settle down at work for you and your coworkers Ive been through trying times in the past when I was with NASA and I can tell you that it will work out for you Im sure Fondly Hattie ThurlowMcKinley
